chunks.text:
This is all about youâ€”your ambitions, skills you want to build, and the experiences youâ€™re eager to explore. Whether youâ€™re looking to develop technical expertise, strengthen leadership abilities, or prepare for your next career step, the IDP is designed to empower you with clarity and focus.

 

Hereâ€™s how we can get started:

1.	Think about your goals: Consider where you want to grow professionally and personally. Connect with your leader to discuss and align.
2.	Explore My Growth page on ONECHALHOUB: https://www.onechalhoub.com/sites/people-culture/SitePageModern/45330/my-growth <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fsites%2Fpeople-culture%2FSitePageModern%2F45330%2Fmy-growth&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C2da184935c234fea3dee08dd0d3c600d%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638681275184103725%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=K5ZOyhhPGLDjl3VawhD9AFl0qTz%2B%2FpiYATJNq67ne7U%3D&reserved=0> 
3.	Login to your drive: Add your IDP to Drive



 

4.	Select Goals from the drop-down menu on top left corner of the screen:



 

5.	Select Individual Development Plan from the drop-down menu:



 

6.	Add your IDP:



 

Please feel free to reach out to me if you would like to discuss about your goals or understand the system better.

 

All the best and kind regards,

 

SABITHA MENONâ€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹
